Cuando adquirí el Valve Pack, decidí volver a pasarme Half-Life y aunque ya me lo he pasado cuatro veces y he jugado a su multijugador tantas horas que ni me acuerdo, digo y seguiré diciendo que es el mejor videojuego de la historia. Este shooter marca un antes y un despues en la manera en la que se realizaban los juegos de la época, sobretodo por su argumento que aunque hay videojuegos mejores en este apartado para la época y para el tipo de juego que es, es bastante buena. En el apartado gráfico nunca olvidaré ese primer día en que lo ví me quede alucinado y aún a día de hoy creo que ha envejecido bastente bien, no se si sera por que lo juego cada año pero sin duda de las cosas mas destacables de el juego es la inteligencia artificial de los enemigos, sobre todo de los militares que tiran las granada en el sitio oportuno, ademas la interacción con el entorno, con los numerosos científicos repartidos por la instalación. La banda sonora la verdad es el apartado en el que flojea ya que si jugamos al juego sin volumen ni nos daremos cuenta aunque si es de destacar el doblaje al castellano que en mi opinión está bastante bien. Largo, pero que entretiene hasta el final, si te quedas con ganas de más, todavia te quedan sus expansiones.

NOTA FINAL: 10 El mejor videojuegojuego de la historia.

No se puede decir mucho a esta altura del partido, el Half-Life es un juego clásico que revolucionó al género fps con su jugabilidad y progreso de historia/juego, algo simple y divertido que todavía logra entretener a la gente hasta en estos años. Recomendadísimo.

This game is actually stupid. If i could be bothered with a 50 hour gameplay i reckon it would be fine. It is just way to difficult giving me increasingly harder fights making sure it isn't fair, this means that i was always put into fights where i really could not win unless i would spend an hour per fight. The assault rifle was useless only useful point blank because of it's random shooting. The crossbow and revolver were the only good guns BUT THEN THEY HAD nearly no ammo. This game has been the most frustrating for me. The maps were very broad and it never told you what to do in retarded situations, this could be good IF IT WAS A PUZZLE GAME. It was soo annoying because it took forever to do something, but if you made a tiny mistake you get really punished for it. The best gamers today have come out of this game alive. Unless you are a veteran this game is not for you. AND NOW MY DPI IS SCREWED BECAUSE GAME CRASHED AND I CAN'T FIX IT. Most frustrated game i have played yet.

Hours of fun for cheap. Graphics are obviously dated but the game is perfectly enjoyable.

I believe this was the very first first-person-shooter game I ever played, and it was still on PC.  I used to watch my dad play it before I gave it a go, actually.

It's an older game so the graphics, obviously, aren't up to par with today's standards.  Either way, this game is still great.  The storyline keeps me enthralled even to this day, almost twenty years later.  

I don't feel like I even need to write too much.  I'd just like to say that if you've ever even considered playing Half-Life, even for a second, that you should click the purchase button.  You won't regret it.

One of the all time greats for PC. I remember playing this when it first released in 1998 and man what a nostalgia trip playing through it again! Graphically it looks a bit rough but the gameplay more than makes up for it. I think I must have been playing on Hard difficulty though as I don't remember the enemies being bullet sponges (especially the soldiers). In the unlikely event that you've never played this game I heartily recommend it.

I remember my times with this game cause everytime I watched my dad play it then few years later I started playing it for  the PC & PS2. And there huge differences between those two versions. if you're console gamer then get it for PS2, but if you're a PC gamer then get it for PC. I'll always love the Half-Life franchise.

Jedna z lepszych gier XX wieku. Kupiłem ją ze względu na fabułę. 
Plusy:
+Grafika (jak na tamte czasy)
+Rozumne AL (kiedy nie atakujesz, zaczynają do ciebie podbiegać)
+Jumpscary w wentylatorach <3
+Długa, miejscami trudna.
Minusy:
-Multiplayery świecą pustką... (Rozumiem, że wiele osób już w nią nie gra, bo jest stara)
-Napis loading pojawiający się często mógłby nie zatrzymywać gry. To jest wkurzające!!!
-CZEMU TE NIEBIESKIE LASERY BIORĄ NA HITA? xDD

9/10

I never forgot how much i enjoyed playing this when i was a kid 
I always played this in our cities only game club and i always was top three there was just 4 or 5 people in my town who could beat me!!!!!!!!! 
back then we only had counter strike and it was kind of a new thing because of the all wierd weapons!
The hours are like secends when you play this multiplayer the most awsome thing about it is the fast rythm of players killing and getting killed its crazy!!! ... 
i had a cousin that never was as good as me but he somehow used to manage to be close to my score by hiding in the places that player appear after death otherwise he couldn't kill anyone even with the rocket luncher!!
i certainly had fun and i can say more and more and more but time passed and now there are some wonderful games that i couldnt believe it when i was  kid but one thing i know and its this game never gets old!!
